thread.title_full: Qorus Software launches online video training hub – because that’s how people want to learn

author: Heather
title: Qorus Software launches online video training hub – because that’s how people want to learn
text:
Qorus Software, a global leader in pitch, proposal and RFP management software, has unveiled an impressive new online training portal designed to make their client on-boarding process even easier. Ray Meiring, CEO of Qorus, explains: “We’re big believers that technology should be simple and intuitive. It’s why our software is based on familiar Microsoft Office tools like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and SharePoint. We also know that superb training and support are vital to a successful implementation. But if Netflix and Amazon have taught us anything, it’s that people like to access content on-demand, and in their own time. “A rigid schedule of live training modules may work well for some of our clients, but it won’t suit all of them. We wanted to cover all bases and give our new clients the ability to choose exactly how they want their users to consume the training.”
Clients who select this training option will receive access to their own online training hub, where users can work through role-specific training modules by watching videos, and completing tutorials and worksheets in their own time. These hubs can be custom-branded and can be set up to contain company-specific examples to make the training even more relevant and engaging.
For more about Qorus, visit: http://www.qorusdocs.com
About Qorus Software
Qorus Software is a leading global provider of document, pitch, proposal and RFP management solutions for organizations looking to simplify the way they do business.
In a world that is increasingly complex, and with clients who continue to demand more for less, we believe that software should be intuitive and easy to use. Which is why our solutions are built on familiar tools like Microsoft Word and PowerPoint with access to re-usable content in a centralized knowledge center.
Our software is designed to be used across all departments, helping you produce customized pitches, proposals, RFP responses, contracts and reports – in a fraction of the time.
Qorus is a proud Microsoft partner, including the Gold Application Development and Silver Cloud Competency.
